name: Neo Track
description:
1. The game is conceptualized on the casual genre where a player(user) can play the game while listening to the music. The whole exposure of the game goes with unique game-play and visuals synced to the music track.

2. The particular levels are designed based on the music track and game-play to it is well set over the highs and lows within it.

3. The collectibles in the play puts up the player to a score goal whereas teleportation on the other side brings up flow to the game.

4. The whole sum-up pulls out the game with the points like theme, color theory, level design, synchronization to music, flow and rhythm within it, idea to game-play and such other similar facts.
